publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2011# Christine Grahame: Borders Education Crisis—That the Parliament notes the possible closure of small rural schools and reduction in the number of teachers as a result of the expected £3.9 million overspend in the education budget of Scottish Borders Council and believes that the Scottish Executive should intervene now and set up an independent inquiry into the actions of the councillors and officials involved. Supported by: Michael Russell*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Bruce Crawford*
